artist: Manufacturer: U.S. Metal Toy Mfg. Co.
description: barn shaped bank on stand; barn is orange-brown with cowboy on a horse and 5 cowboys on front; cowboy on galloping horse on right side; cowgirl with tied horse on left side; 2 cowboys with horses on back
inscription:
Inscriptions

on bottom, in ink: [2 (or L in script?)]; on right side, in black: [US / Metal Toy / Mfg Co / MADE IN USA]; on front, in black: [Bar X Dude Ranch]
title: "Bar X Dude Ranch" still bank
